Class DefaultCellEditor

java.lang.Object
com.dua3.meja.ui.swing.DefaultCellEditor

public class DefaultCellEditor extends Object implements CellEditor
Default implementation for cell editor.

  • Constructor Details

    • DefaultCellEditor

      public DefaultCellEditor(SwingSheetView sheetView)
      Constructs a DefaultCellEditor instance for the specified SwingSheetView. This editor is responsible for managing cell editing functionality within the sheet view. It initializes the underlying editor pane, binds keyboard actions for editing, and sets default properties for the editor component.
      Parameters:
      sheetView - the SwingSheetView associated with this cell editor

      public void stopEditing(boolean commit)

      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      commit - if true, changes will be applied to the edited cell

    • updateCellContent

      protected void updateCellContent()
      Updates the content of the cell being edited by fetching the text from the associated component's document, formatting it, and applying it to the cell.

      This method retrieves the text from the document linked to the editor component. If an error occurs during retrieval, it assigns a default error value ("#ERROR") to the text. The retrieved text is then processed and set to the cell using a CellValueHelper, which handles parsing and formatting of the value based on locale-specific number and date formats.

      The CellValueHelper ensures the proper conversion and application of the text to the cell, accommodating various types of values, such as numbers, dates, booleans, formulas, or plain text.

      If assertions are enabled, this method will throw an AssertionError if the cell is null.
